title: Ainsworth Strange Situation infant secure attached

content.prompt: In the Strange Situation experiment, infants who were classified as securely attached were more likely to do which of the following?

choices.label: Have a tantrum when the mother left the room
Express happiness when the mother returned to the room
Prevent the mother from leaving the room
Try to play with the stranger when the mother left the room

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
